mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer) values (tbl_board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title} , content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board order by bno desc

select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from (select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0) where rownum between #{page} and 10 order by bno desc, regdate desc

select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from (select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0) where rownum between #{pageStart} and #{perPageNum} order by bno desc, regdate desc
